Our Curve Basix Compression Leggings are far from basic. If you're looking for
more from your leggings, then these are the perfect fit for you. A great
contoured legging with built in compression technology.



**Fit & Features**

  * Moisture wicking fabric to keep you cool and dry
  * Power-stretch mesh material used for built in compression for the waist, tummy and hips
  * Redesigned wide shaped waistband with power-stretch mesh lining for comfortable tummy compression
  * Added side panels with power-stretch mesh lining for extra support
  * Long front and back rises for a comfortable and supportive fit
  * Hidden elastic inside top waistband to prevent from sliding down.
  * Flatlock seaming to prevent chafing
  * Wide lined gusset for the perfect fit & having you feeling fresh throughout your workout
  * Reflective Rainbeau logo at the center back of waistband
  * Imported



**Garment Specs**

  * Inseam:

28" (all sizes)

|

  * Leg Opening:

9" (18/20)  
  
---|---  
  


**Fabrication**

  * Body: Jersey 

88% Cotton 12% Spandex |

  * Trim: Power Mesh

75% Nylon 25% Spandex  
---|---  
  


**Perfect for** : Yoga, Pilates, Running, Indoor & Outdoor Workouts,
Athleisure activities, Power workouts



_**Model is wearing 14/16 - 1X_
